level.text: In the event that an application for a license to operate a video arcade is denied, the Mayor shall provide the applicant with a written statement setting forth the reasons for the denial within thirty (30) days of the date of the denial, as evidenced by any written or verbal notification to the applicant that his or her applicant has been denied.
Any applicant may appeal an adverse decision of the Mayor to the Board of Appeals and Review of the District of Columbia.
